qas.question: What do Christians believe regarding Jesus' death?

answers.text: instrumental in restoring humankind to relationship with God

qas.question: How are people united with God?

answers.text: through faith in Jesus’ substitutionary death

qas.question: What specific fact do Christians believe about death?

answers.text: eternal life in heaven after the body’s death
